rows.label: qst003201_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh no oh no oh no! I'm... He's...
Ohh, what am I going to do?!

rows.label: qst003201_msg0002
rows.name: I can't go and help him myself!

rows.label: qst003201_msg0005
rows.name:
Nothing is all right!
Everything is awful!

rows.label: qst003201_msg0006
rows.name:
Oh...right. I guess I should
explain from the beginning.

rows.label: qst003201_msg0007
rows.name: Well, I was living in Acedia, see...

rows.label: qst003201_msg0008
rows.name:
But apparently Acedia's done for,
so we all tried to get ourselves
on the first ship out of there!

rows.label: qst003201_msg0009
rows.name:
It was pretty crazy, actually.
Everyone from the refugee camp
descending on the port all at once...

rows.label: qst003201_msg0010
rows.name:
Thankfully, I managed to get safely
onto a ship, but then right when my
friend Bonono tried to get on...

rows.label: qst003201_msg0011
rows.name:
Kabaaaam! The whole of Acedia got
whacked into the World Tree!

rows.label: qst003201_msg0012
rows.name:
And Bonono...he went flying!
Clean off Acedia, he went!

rows.label: qst003201_msg0013
rows.name:
And now? If he fell in Cloud
Sea, well, he's had it. But if
he landed on the Tree itself...

rows.label: qst003201_msg0014
rows.name:
I have no idea if he's still
alive... But I feel like
I've got to do something!

rows.label: qst003201_msg0015
rows.name:
R-really?! You'll help me look?!
Oh, please find him for me!

rows.label: qst003201_msg0016
rows.name:
If he's all right, I think
he'll be on the outer wall
of the World Tree.

rows.label: qst003201_msg0017
rows.name:
But if he fell into the
Cloud Sea, I guess there
really isn't any hope...

rows.label: qst003201_msg0101
rows.name: Please find my friend Bonono for me!
